PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1996-05681996-04-230FIN,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendments to the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS which remove the reference to Registered Home Ownership Savings Plans in subsection 7000(6) dealing with the reporting of interest on "prescribed contracts", and extend the exemption period for making an annual report on the interest earned on a RRSP or RRIF deposit, following the death of the annuitant.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1996-0225 Publication Date: 1996-05-15
Attachments
